title: League of Legends new client needs to show SKINS OWNED.

replies.body: Yes. I often forget what skins I own and need some way of finding out that isn't me looking through every champion in the game to find out that I don't have many.

I agree one hundred percent. please under store or collection just simply put an OWNED skins that ONLY shows the owned skins.. They have that button but unfortunately it scrambles your own skins in with 10000 other purchasable skins SUCKSSS :(((((
PLEASE FIX THIS RITO

You know that before you queue for a game, you can select the champs you "want to take out for a tumble" and click on the skins tab to see which ones you have, right? They're the ones that don't have a padlock on the bottom of them.

You can go in to the store, go to the skins, and list them by champ and have an alphabetical list that tells you which skins you own for what champ.

You can even do this whilst you're queueing for a game, and the best part is, unlike the old  client that ditched you back to the main screen if queue popped but didn't happen, you can keep looking through on the page you're on.

There are a couple suggestions to help you find champs to ruin team compositions with because they have a skin you haven't seen in a while.
